tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    drone_operator BOOLEAN,
    maintenance_personnel BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE users
(
id INT PRIMARY KEY,
username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drone_operators
(
operator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
operator_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
license_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
approved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_personnel
(
personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
personnel_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
shift VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE DroneOperators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  operator_license_id VARCHAR(20),
  access_level ENUM('basic', 'advanced', 'admin')
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenancePersonnel (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  maintenance_license_id VARCHAR(20),
  access_level ENUM('basic', 'admin')
);

CREATE TABLE AccessPermissions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  role ENUM('operator', 'maintenance'),
  permission_type ENUM('read', 'write', 'admin'),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role ENUM('operator', 'maintenance'),
    permissions VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE drones (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_name VARCHAR(255),
    operator_id INT,
    maintenance_id INT,
    status ENUM('active', 'inactive')
)

CREATE TABLE operators (
    operator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    license_number VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_personnel (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    certification VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE permissions (
    permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permission_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)
